translation.en: The Mega Mitten. The power's not just in your hands.
translation.es: El Mega Mitten. El poder no solo está en tus manos.

translation.en: - - It is your hands.
translation.es: El Mega Mitten. El poder no solo está en tus manos. Es tus manos.

translation.en: The Mega Mitten.
For the Nextronico Gaming Entertainment System.
translation.es: Para el sistema de juegos Nextronico.

translation.en: Now you are one with the games.
translation.es: Ahora eres uno con los juegos.

translation.en: Coming up next , it's an all- new Saturday Morning All Star Hits!
translation.es: ¡A continuación, un nuevo Saturday Morning All Star Hits

translation.en: with Skip and Treybor!
Whoa! What's up, kids? I'm Skip!
And I'm Treybor. And we're the new hosts of S.M.A.S.H.!
translation.es: Yo soy Treybor. Los nuevos conductores de S.M.A.S.H.

translation.en: - Saturday… - Morning…
- …All… - …Star…
Hits!
Wait, if it's Saturday, why are we at school?
translation.es: Si es sábado, ¿por qué estamos en la escuela?

translation.en: 'Cause we're finally gonna make school fun by adding TV!
If this is school, then I say more detention, please.
translation.es: Si la escuela es así, quiero más castigos, por favor.

translation.en: Today's assignment, watch the totally tubular cartoonage we got smashin' at ya!
translation.es: La tarea de hoy es mirar la caricatura genial que daremos.

translation.en: Plus, we got a super sizzlin' sneak peek at the new Johnny Rash movie!
translation.es: ¡Además, tenemos un adelanto de la nueva película de Johnny Rash!

translation.en: Yeah, and I've got a sneak peek at the doggy dance.
translation.es: Y tengo un adelanto del baile del perrito.

translation.en: - - Skip, you're doggone crazy.
Bark! Bark! Bark! Bark! Bark!
We'll be right bark-- I mean, back! After an all- new episode of…
translation.es: Ladraremos… ¡Digo, volveremos! Después de un nuevo episodio de…

translation.en: Randy! Ah!
♪ Randy ♪
♪ Our best dino pal ♪
♪ He came from long ago But lives with us now ♪
translation.es: Vino de un tiempo muy lejano Pero ahora vive con nosotros

translation.en: ♪ Adventures ♪ ♪ Are always in store ♪
♪ He and the gang are ready to explore ♪
translation.es: Él y la pandilla Están listos para explorar

translation.en: ♪ But ♪ ♪ It ain't easy being big and green With teeth that look mean ♪
translation.es: Pero no es fácil ser grande y verde Con dientes que lo hacen parecer malo

translation.en: ♪ But he's a cool skater dude ♪
translation.es: Pero es un patinador genial Con una gran actitud

translation.en: ♪ With a good attitude you'll see ♪
translation.es: Pero es un patinador genial Con una gran actitud Ya verán AUTOS USADOS

translation.en: ♪ Randy ♪ ♪ The biggest heart in town ♪
translation.es: Randy, el corazón más grande de la ciudad

translation.en: ♪ So come on, everybody And gather around ♪
translation.es: Así que vengan todos y reúnanse alrededor

translation.en: ♪ And meet Randy ♪
So… th… that's just it then?
I guess so.
Would you want to, like, take some time away from each other and…
and maybe just s- see where we're at?
I don't think so, Randy.
But I… I could be better.
I think this is just how it has to be.
translation.es: Creo que esto es lo que debemos hacer.

translation.en: I really do love you so much.
Love you too.
Task Force 27 to 200 North Main Street.
translation.es: Fuerza Especial 27 a 200 North Main Street.

translation.en: Terry!
I should go.
Yeah.
Oh. Okay.
- - No, just--
My legs always get kinda caught on this thing right here.
translation.es: Mis piernas siempre se atoran con esto.

translation.en: - Your tail's hitting the-- - Damn it!
It's fine. It's fine. It's fine.
- - Well, see ya.
Heather?
No, uh… uh… Michael's upstairs.
Just tell him I'm not here.
I hate myself.
- What was that? -
Nothing.
I said I hate myself.
- Okay, I… I can't quite make it out. -
But, uh, it sounds like you're saying that you don't like yourself.
translation.es: Pero suena a que dices que no te agradas.

translation.en: No.
I didn't say I don't like myself.
translation.es: No dije que no me agrado.

translation.en: - I said I hate myself. -
Now it sounds like you're sort of, uh, quietly correcting me,
translation.es: Ahora parece que me corriges en voz baja

translation.en: and I'm just very concerned about you, Randy.
translation.es: y estoy muy preocupado por ti, Randy.

translation.en: All right, Dr. Kottrellberg, seems like you fixed me.
translation.es: Bien, Dr. Kottrellberg, creo que me arregló.

translation.en: - Really? - No.
All right, well, just take care of yourself.
I forgot to tell you one thing, Dr. K, that I wish I was extinct.
translation.es: Olvidé decirle algo, Dr. K. Que desearía estar extinto.

translation.en: Hey, Dr. Kottrellberg, can Randy come out and hang with us?
translation.es: Hola, Dr. Kottrellberg, ¿puede salir Randy a jugar?

translation.en: Uh, I'm afraid he's… he's not feeling well, Michael.
translation.es: Me temo que no se siente bien, Michael.

translation.en: Dr. K, is Randy around?
Maybe try next week, Shawna.
Is Randy free?
Not gonna happen, Rocko.
Randy! Randy! Come on!
Yeah, Randy, come on.
Let's live our lives!
We're only young once! Come on, let's play!
The whole gang's here!
Randy! Randy! Randy! Randy!
I told you guys, he's still the same old Randy.
translation.es: Se los dije. Sigue siendo el mismo Randy de siempre.

translation.en: Oh, buddy.
Saturday Morning All Star Hits! will return after these messages.
translation.es: Saturday Morning All Star Hits! volverá luego de estos comerciales.

translation.en: ♪ Rogo! ♪
Little crafts… - Can you please give me a cat? - No!
Can't you read the sign?
Can't you read the sign?
translation.es: ¿No lee el letrero? REGLAS: COMER Y NO HACER SILENCIO

translation.en: You're in big trouble, young man!
Oh no. Guess I better book it.
translation.es: Ay, no. Creo que mejor me voy.

translation.en: Let's just watch more Randy.
Wait, so she was just like, We're not doing this anymore?
translation.es: Espera. ¿Ella dijo: Ya no haremos esto?

translation.en: I guess it was sort of like, we got our whole lives ahead of us.
translation.es: Algo de que teníamos la vida por delante.

translation.en: And 'cause I, like, live in a museum basement,
translation.es: Y como vivo en el sótano de un museo

translation.en: and I don't kiss her as much anymore,
translation.es: y ya no la beso tanto

translation.en: and I get drunk a lot, I'm maybe not a good partner.
translation.es: y bebo demasiado, quizá no soy un gran partido.

translation.en: - What does she mean? - That's dumb.
Pshh. Girls are weird, dude.
By my calculations, she doesn't deserve you.
translation.es: Según mis cálculos, no te merece. RANDY ES GENIAL

translation.en: Thanks, Digit.
Well, we're psyched to have you back, man.
Thanks, guys.
I mean, I… I guess she's sort of right.
translation.es: Supongo que tiene algo de razón.

translation.en: I've never really pushed myself.
Maybe 'cause I'm, like, a dinosaur.
translation.es: Tal vez porque soy un dinosaurio.

translation.en: I mean, I left the only world I knew,
translation.es: Dejé el único mundo que conocía,

translation.en: got zapped into the future where I'm the last of my kind,
translation.es: me enviaron al futuro, donde soy el último de mi especie

translation.en: then I find out I'm not even the last of my kind!
translation.es: y descubro que ni siquiera soy el último de mi especie.

translation.en: You guys should be wearing helmets.
- Shut up, Newton! - Go away, Newton!
I'll seriously kick your butt, dude!
Plus, I never told you guys,
but I've never really been comfortable with my body.
translation.es: pero nunca me sentí cómodo con mi cuerpo.

translation.en: Whoa, a house party!
You need a pal, don't ya?
Yeah, I guess.
Rad!
Just admit it, human beings got lucky.
Dinosaurs should've stayed on the planet.
translation.es: Los dinosaurios deberían haberse quedado en el planeta.

translation.en: I mean, can a human do this?
I said, can a human do this?
translation.es: Pregunté si un humano puede hacer esto.

translation.en: Hey, Randy, take it easy, man.
I'm cool, dude.
- Whoops. - Holy crap!
- Fire! -
Fire, man!
Oh my God, fire!
Run! Fire!
This is kind of crazy, right?
- You're still drinking. - What?
The fire is almost gone.
There shouldn't have been a fire in the first place, Randy.
translation.es: No debió haber habido un incendio, Randy.

translation.en: Oh, here we go. Please, tell me how much of a screw- up I am.
translation.es: Aquí vamos. Por favor, dime el desastre que soy.

translation.en: Let's hear about my bad hygiene,
'cause when I say I'm brushing my teeth,
translation.es: porque digo que me lavo los dientes

translation.en: I'm actually just splashing the water around
and thinking about playing video games.
The point is, someone could've gotten seriously hurt here, Randy.
Yeah, but they didn't. Maybe you should lighten up.
translation.es: Sí, pero no sucedió. Quizá deberías relajarte.

translation.en: Hey, Randy, I think it's time for you to get out of here.
translation.es: Randy, creo que es hora de que te vayas.

translation.en: Newton? I see what's happening here.
translation.es: ¿Newton? Ya veo lo que está pasando aquí.

translation.en: Cool. Gotcha.
Bye, Heather. I hope I never see you again.
translation.es: Adiós, Heather. Espero no volver a verte.

translation.en: - - And just so you know, I was lying.
translation.es: Y para que lo sepas, estaba mintiendo.

translation.en: You suck at dancing.
You can't take that blanket with you!
- You okay? - Oh yeah. I'm…
I'm fine. It's just…  …he's so frustrating.
translation.es: Estoy bien. Es solo que es muy frustrante.

translation.en: I know. He's such a great dinosaur, but--
translation.es: Lo sé. Es un gran dinosaurio, pero…

translation.en: Can be a jerk who spends so much time lounging…
translation.es: También puede ser un bobo que pasa tanto en el sofá

translation.en: …you'd think he was supermodel Sasha Sinclair
sunbathing on an exotic beach.
translation.es: tomando sol en una playa exótica.

translation.en: There you go, little buddy.
- - I don't think he'll make it.
It's like he could do anything he wanted if he just got out of his own way.
translation.es: Podría hacer lo que quisiera si dejara de comportarse así.

translation.en: I made it!
Like, seriously, he could go to school for doing drum machines.
translation.es: Podría ir a un conservatorio a tocar la batería.

translation.en: - If I could weigh in here-- - Go home, Newton!
translation.es: - Si me permiten… - ¡Ve a casa, Newton!

translation.en: I guess…  …Randy's just got to make his own choices.
translation.es: Supongo que Randy tiene que tomar sus propias decisiones.

translation.en: That's what hurts me most.
Just standing on the sidelines, watching him mess up his whole life.
translation.es: Quedarme al margen, viéndolo arruinar su vida.

translation.en: But I'm not his mom and I'm not his shrink,
translation.es: Pero no soy su mamá y no soy su psiquiatra

translation.en: and maybe I shouldn't be his girlfriend.
translation.es: y tal vez no debería ser su novia.

translation.en: - - You should make sure your friend's okay.
translation.es: Asegúrate de que tu amigo esté bien.

translation.en: You're a good person, Heather.
Saturday Morning All Star Hits! will return after these messages.
translation.es: Saturday Morning All Star Hits! volverá luego de estos comerciales.

translation.en: The battle for Strongar rages in your hands.
translation.es: La batalla por Strongar se libra en tus manos.

translation.en: The War Boars will destroy your puny Peace Prisms.
translation.es: Los jabalíes de guerra destruirán tus prismas de la paz.

translation.en: - Back off, Hammer Hog. - It's Tigor, with whip attack tail.
translation.es: - Atrás, Hammer Hog. - Es Tigor, con su cola de látigo.

translation.en: My hatedar is picking up trouble.
- Drogg, with real- feeling tongue. - It's so wet!
translation.es: Drogg, con su lengua real. ¡Es muy húmeda!

translation.en: Kickaroo's fingernails really grow!
And don't forget Guinja.
Fill him with water, freeze him overnight, and he makes real ice!
translation.es: Llénalo con agua, congélalo durante la noche y hará hielo.

translation.en: Hey, Skip, do you think there's intelligent life out there?
I don't think there's intelligent life in here.
translation.es: No creo que haya vida inteligente aquí.

translation.en: Hey, that was rude.
Now check out Create- A- Crittles.
Once upon a time,
a struggling young artist by the name of David Gnubbens
translation.es: un joven artista frustrado llamado David Gnubbens

translation.en: stumbled upon magical creatures.
translation.es: que se encontró con criaturas mágicas.

translation.en: They taught him the true potential of creativity.
translation.es: Le enseñaron el verdadero potencial de la creatividad.

translation.en: The Create- A- Crittles.
Little did David know,
he started a friendship that could never end.
translation.es: que comenzó una amistad que nunca terminaría.

translation.en: The world just isn't ready for the Create- A- Crittles.
translation.es: El mundo no está listo para las creaturas.

translation.en: So David must keep them a secret from everyone, especially his family.
translation.es: David debe mantenerlas en secreto de todos, especialmente de su familia.

translation.en: Oh no, please not tonight. No, not tonight.
translation.es: No, por favor, no esta noche.

translation.en: Okay, great.
- Oh, hi. Is Fifi asleep? - Yep.
Are you prepared
for your big corporate project meeting in the morning?
translation.es: para tu gran reunión corporativa mañana?

translation.en: - Yep. - I know you'll close the deal.
translation.es: - Sí. - Sé que cerrarás el trato.

translation.en: Yeah, I just gotta do one last thing and take out the trash.
translation.es: Sí, debo hacer una última cosa y sacar la basura.

translation.en: - Don't wait up for me. -
It's Create- A- Crittle time--
Crittles? Hello?
David, we thought you bailed on us.
translation.es: David, pensamos que nos habías abandonado.

translation.en: Sorry I'm late, Brusho. I've just been really busy today.
translation.es: Perdón la demora, Brusho. Estuve muy ocupado hoy.

translation.en: Trying to snip us out of your life?
Of course not, Scizzi.
Look, I love you guys. You give my life so much--
translation.es: Miren, los quiero. Le dan a mi vida tanto…

translation.en: Color?
Argie B, you said it.
So here we are, my three best friends.
translation.es: Aquí estamos. Mis tres mejores amigos.

translation.en: - - Oh, right. Pasto.
My eyes must've fallen out!
translation.es: ¡Se me deben haber caído los ojos!

translation.en: Pasto, come here. Let me help you out with that.
translation.es: Ven aquí. Déjame ayudarte con eso.

translation.en: Thank you, David.
Ugh. Oh no. Look at this. I ruined your project.
translation.es: Ay, no. Miren esto. Arruiné su proyecto.

translation.en: No, you didn't ruin it. You fixed it.
Yeah! And you mixed up all the colors!
This is why I love you guys. You're so creative.
translation.es: Por eso los quiero. Son muy creativos.

translation.en: You aren't afraid to make a big mess.
translation.es: No tienen miedo de hacer un desastre.

translation.en: Because that's where you find the masterpiece.
So, what do you call this mess? I mean, um, masterpiece?
translation.es: ¿Cómo llaman a este desastre? Digo, obra maestra.

translation.en: This is Paste- or, the giant robot from my solo show that opens tomorrow.
translation.es: Este es Paste-Or, el robot gigante de mi show que se inaugura mañana.

translation.en: - What? - You remember.
You're the guest of honor.
Yeah, you can count on me, Pasto. I'll be there.
translation.es: Sí, cuenta conmigo, Pasto. Allí estaré.

translation.en: I'm counting on you. Look, and here's your ticket.
translation.es: Cuento contigo. Y aquí tienes tu boleto.

translation.en: It's very big for a ticket.
translation.es: Es muy grande para un boleto.

translation.en: - Wow! I love these bubble letters. - Yeah. Brusho did the bubble letters.
translation.es: Me encantan las letras burbuja. Sí, Brusho hizo las letras.

translation.en: Oh, well, they're really cool.
I know, but honestly, I did have a little inspiration.
translation.es: Lo sé, pero, sinceramente, tuve un poco de inspiración.

translation.en: Here. Have some Crittle Glitter.
translation.es: Toma algo de brillantina de creaturas.

translation.en: Oh, uh, not tonight, 'cause tomorrow morning I got that big corporate project meeting.
translation.es: Esta noche no, mañana tengo la reunión corporativa.

translation.en: Oh, you're going through with that corporate project?
translation.es: ¿Vas a seguir adelante con ese proyecto corporativo?

translation.en: 'Cause I thought you knew that if you did that,
translation.es: Pensé que sabías que si hacías eso,

translation.en: we'd never talk to you again.
I'm kidding. That corporate project sounds cool.
Hey, stay here, have one cream soda, then we'll let you get to bed.
translation.es: Quédate, toma un refresco y luego te dejamos ir a la cama.

translation.en: I knew you guys would understand. One cream soda, please.
translation.es: Sabía que entenderían. Un refresco, por favor.

translation.en: - - We're totally good.
Oh my gosh, guys!
You wanna see my dance?
David! David. David. David.
We've invited you to this big corporate project meeting
translation.es: Te invitamos a esta reunión de proyectos corporativos

translation.en: based on the strength of your portfolio.
translation.es: por el potencial de tus diseños.

translation.en: It's very creative.
Yeah. Creative.  You know what they say,
translation.es: Sí. Creativos. Es como dicen, una obra maestra sale de un desastre.

translation.en: you gotta make a big mess to find the masterpiece.
translation.es: Es como dicen, una obra maestra sale de un desastre.

translation.en: - Make a big mess? - David Gnubbens!
This corporation has rules.
Oh, no, no, no. It's, uh, it's just a… a metaphor.
I'm not making a… a literal mess. No, no.  I'll be good.
translation.es: No haré literalmente un desastre. No, lo haré bien.

translation.en: Very well, David, very well.
Now, we're going to take a chance on you and allow you to work
on the crown jewel of our empire, the Bumpy B Subs logo.
translation.es: en la joya de nuestro imperio, el logo de los sándwiches Bumpy B.

translation.en: Oh wow, I've always loved the Bumpy's logo.
translation.es: Vaya, siempre me gustó el logo de Bumpy.

translation.en: It's so simple.
He thinks it looks simple?
This logo took decades to perfect.
When we tried a version with serif, our stock dropped 700%.
translation.es: Cuando probamos una versión con serifa, nuestras acciones cayeron un 700 %.

translation.en: The last designer who worked on it killed himself!
translation.es: ¡El último diseñador que trabajó en él se suicidó!

translation.en: So, David, are you willing to dedicate your life to the Bumpy B?
translation.es: David, ¿dedicarás tu vida a la B de Bumpy?

translation.en: - Yes, sir. - Well, then prove it…
by eating this bowl of barf.
Is this a joke?
Ah. Very well. Nice to know you. Kickoff over. Have a nice day.
translation.es: Un placer conocerte. Se acabó. Buen día.

translation.en: No, no, no! I'll do it! I'll eat it! I'll eat the barf. I'll do it!
- David! David, we're kidding! -
- Oh golly. Oh yeah. - You passed the test.
We're not monsters.
We just love the Bumpy B more than anything.
translation.es: Amamos la B de Bumpy más que a nada.

translation.en: Oh, no, no.
Me too.
Oh, you guys really got me. I thought that was real barf.
translation.es: Me la hicieron. Pensé que era vómito de verdad.

translation.en: Well, the barf is real.
translation.es: Bueno, el vómito es de verdad.

translation.en: Oh, and it has been sitting out for some time.
translation.es: Y se ha estacionado por un tiempo.

translation.en: Flanagan, please throw this in the rubbish and prepare David's contract.
translation.es: Flanagan, tira esto a la basura y prepara el contrato de David.

translation.en: - - Hello?
Honey, I've got great news! I'm designing the new Bumpy B!
translation.es: - ¿Hola? - ¡Cariño, buenas noticias! ¡Diseñaré la nueva B de Bumpy!

translation.en: - Brilliant! - This calls for champagne!
Oh, this is the life. Hey, hon, how's it going in there?
translation.es: Esto es la buena vida. Oye, cariño, ¿cómo va todo?

translation.en: Be right out!
Look, the strap on my outfit broke.
Do you have any paste?
I'll paste it back on and give you a show.
translation.es: Lo pegaré y te daré un show.

translation.en: Paste. Show.
Pasto's show.
Oh no, um, uh… You know what?
I think I have to go outside and, uh, uh, take out the trash.
translation.es: Creo que debo salir y sacar la basura.

translation.en: Now, David, don't you think the trash can wait?
translation.es: ¿No crees que la basura puede esperar?

translation.en: Trust me, I can compete with a smelly bag of trash.
translation.es: Confía en mí, puedo competir con una bolsa de basura apestosa.

translation.en: You know what, actually?
I think I'm gonna like not taking out the trash.
translation.es: Creo que me gustará no sacar la basura.

translation.en: Now where's that paste?
Well, I guess David hates me.
translation.es: Bueno, supongo que David me odia.

translation.en: David doesn't hate you. It was that evil corporate project meeting.
translation.es: No te odia. Fue la reunión corporativa.

translation.en: It's turned him corporate!
Hey, uh, I don't want to stand. Can I take David's seat?
translation.es: No quiero estar parado. ¿Puedo usar el asiento de David?

translation.en: No, no, no! He still might come.
You know the rules. No late entry. Now, Pasto, show us what you got.
translation.es: Sabes las reglas. No se entra tarde. Muéstranos qué tienes.

translation.en: All right, Paste- or and I welcome you to the greatest…
translation.es: Muy bien, Paste-Or y yo les damos bienvenida al mejor,

translation.en: …funnest…
…coolest show ever!
translation.es: y más genial show que ha habido.

translation.en: The Pasto Show!
Hey, Treybor, I bet if I gave you a ten- second head start,
translation.es: Treybor, a que si te doy diez segundos de ventaja,

translation.en: you couldn't beat me in a race.
translation.es: no me vencerías en una carrera.

translation.en: Yeah, right. I've always been the faster twin.
translation.es: Sí, seguro. Siempre fui el gemelo más rápido.

translation.en: You're on.
Okay. On your mark, get set, go!
I want my mommy!
One, two, three, four, five, six, seven, eight, nine, ten!
translation.es: ¡Un, dos, tres, cuatro, cinco, seis, siete, ocho, nueve, diez!

translation.en: Hey, Treyb, I'm actually kinda jealous. You never told me you were taking a trip.
translation.es: Treyb, estoy un poco celoso. No me contaste que te ibas de viaje.

translation.en: Ow. That wasn't cool, man.
But you know what is cool?
This super S.M.A.S.H.!- clusive movie preview from your favorite star, Johnny Rash!
translation.es: ¡Este genial adelanto de la película de su estrella favorita, Johnny Rash!

translation.en: Check it out.
Hey, I'm Johnny Rash on the set of my new movie,
translation.es: Soy Johnny Rash en el set de mi nueva película

translation.en: and you've never seen or heard me quite like this before.
translation.es: y nunca me han visto ni escuchado así.

translation.en: - We love you, Johnny.  - Ah, shut up. Check it out.
translation.es: Te amamos, Johnny. Cállense. Miren esto.

translation.en: Tyler's new in town,
translation.es: Tyler es nuevo en la ciudad

translation.en: and he's about to learn that high school
translation.es: y está por aprender que la secundaria

translation.en: isn't all it's cracked up to be.
translation.es: no es tan mala como parece.

translation.en: - We have a new student. His name is Tyler. -
But there's something a little different about Tyler.
He's a Rollerblader.
My skates!
And when you Rollerblade at Hamilton High,
translation.es: Y si los usas en la secundaria Hamilton,

translation.en: you don't exactly fit in.
Here. Take this.
A skateboard?
But skateboarding isn't Tyler's only problem.
translation.es: Pero la patineta no es su único problema.

translation.en: - - He's got a royally big secret.
Lauren, I have to be honest about something.
translation.es: Lauren, debo ser sincero sobre algo.

translation.en: Yeah, tell me anything.
As you can see, I am…
not a fan of pizza.
But his luck is about to change when Tyler finds…
translation.es: Pero su suerte cambiará cuando Tyler encuentre…

translation.en: …one million dollars.
Eat my dust, Jacob!
But it's going to take a lot more than money…
translation.es: Pero va a costar mucho más que dinero…

translation.en: You used to be different.
…to win over the girl of Tyler's dreams.
translation.es: conquistar a la chica de sus sueños.

translation.en: Now you're like everyone else.
Come on, Lauren. Clearly I'm different than everyone else.
translation.es: Vamos, Lauren. Claramente soy diferente a los demás.

translation.en: Look at me. I'm…
inside a sports car.
And his world's about to turn upside down when he finds out…
translation.es: Y su mundo se pondrá patas para arriba cuando sepa…

translation.en: I'm on the Skyhawks?
Hey, Tyler, when the game's on the line, I'm passing you the rock.
translation.es: Cuando el juego esté en riesgo, te pasaré la pelota.

translation.en: Mo Jones knows my name?
But before he steps on the court, he's gotta go back in time…
translation.es: Pero antes de salir a la cancha, debe volver en el tiempo.

translation.en: Okay, now you dudes look weird.
- …and then go forward in time. - Whoa! Huh?
translation.es: Y luego avanzar en el tiempo.

translation.en: Hey, teach, my report's gonna be a little
translation.es: Profesor, mi informe será un poco…

translation.en: different.
♪ That's why class is dismissed ♪
translation.es: Por eso se termina la clase

translation.en: Hey, Martinez, not bad.
Here, you know what to do with this.
translation.es: Ya sabes qué hacer con esto.

translation.en: He's…
- - …amazing.
- - Matt Hartwell, Lottie Wolfe,
the Spider Brothers, and Johnny Rash as…
translation.es: los Hermanos Araña y Johnny Rash en…

translation.en: the Video Game Master.
You forgot to mention one thing.
I'm…
a ninth- grader.
Whoa, that movie looks zuzzy zazz.
- What? - What's wrong?
Still want your mommy?
I want my mommy!
I was just trying to make you laugh.
No, you weren't.
Yeah, I was.
All right, we got some great cartoons next week,
translation.es: Hay caricaturas geniales la otra semana.

translation.en: including a brand- new Strongimals!
Yeah, and I'm on it.
- You're what? - Yup.
The Skipster's doing a voice.
I wonder what I'll look like all cartoonified.
translation.es: Me pregunto cómo me veré caricaturizado.

translation.en: Wow, that's, um…
Good… Good for you, Skip. That's great.
translation.es: Bien por ti, Skip. Eso es genial.

translation.en: Until next week, kids.
translation.es: Hasta la otra semana. Y recuerden,

translation.en: Remember, you're never too old to yell,
translation.es: Hasta la otra semana. Y recuerden, nunca serán demasiado viejos para gritar: ¡Quiero a mi mami!.

translation.en: I want my mommy!
translation.es: nunca serán demasiado viejos para gritar: ¡Quiero a mi mami!.
